message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I know you're interested in. I'm asking for $11,000. It's a fair price, considering its value to you. What do you say?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $11,000 on it. Would you consider lowering the price to $9,500?
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. That's still a good deal for both of us, considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it, but I'm still not able to justify spending $10,500 on this product. Could we meet somewhere closer to my budget, perhaps at $10,000?
